name: cypress-split-example
description: Split Cypress specs on GitHub Actions and CircleCI

scripts.block-0: SPLIT=2 SPLIT_INDEX=0 xvfb-run -a npx cypress run
scripts.block-1:
SPLIT=2 SPLIT_INDEX=1
     xvfb-run -a npx cypress run
scripts.postparallel: mkdirp cypress/reports && mochawesome-merge cypress/results/*.json -o cypress/reports/combined.json && marge cypress/reports/combined.json --charts true --report-dir cypress/reports --reportFilename combined
scripts.debug: DEBUG=cypress-split SPLIT=6 SPLIT_INDEX=5 npx cypress run
